item.title: Version 1.1.0
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey

  • Bug Fix: Fixed an issue where some apps (especially those that hide in the menu bar) wouldn't open on the first launch. Triggering the shortcut a second time now correctly opens them.
  • New Feature: Quickly assign apps by triggering a global shortcut, which can be configured in settings.
  • New Feature: Added colorful themes. Select your favorite theme from the settings menu.
  • Improvement: The app now uses a standard macOS window instead of a floating panel.
  • Improvement: You can now assign shortcuts to trigger on a single click, a hold, a double-click, or a triple-click.

item.title: Version 1.0.6
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey

  • Fixed - Launch at Login: Resolved an issue that prevented the "Launch at Login" setting from working correctly.
  • Fixed - Brightness Keys: Addressed a bug where the functions row keys were not functioning.
  • Fixed - Caps Lock: Corrected an issue that caused the Caps Lock key to not work properly.

item.title: Version 1.0.5
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey

  • Bug Fixes: Addressed several bugs that caused the app to freeze, especially when using the cycle feature.
  • New Features: Added a Cheatsheet (adjust its shortcut in settings). Reworked the shortcut system: removed trigger/secondary keys in favor of assigning any shortcut to any app via the menu.

item.title: Version 1.0.4
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey

  • App Assignment Fixed: Resolved a critical bug where the hotkey for assigning new apps was not being recognized.
  • Improved Collision Logic: The app now correctly prevents a key from being used in multiple trigger groups simultaneously.

item.title: Version 1.0.3
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey 1.0.3

  • New Menu Bar Launcher: The menu bar icon now opens a quick-launch menu to run your shortcuts directly.
  • Hotkey-Optional Shortcuts: You can now create shortcuts without assigning a hotkey, making them accessible from the new menu.
  • Fixes & Polish: Corrected the app version display, made the author credit a colored link, and cleaned up the UI for a better experience.

item.title: Version 1.0.2
item.description:
• New: Added a HyperKey feature.
  • New: Added an app selection popup when adding a new application.
  • Improved: More robust permissions checking.
  • Fixed: A crash that occurred when clicking the help page from the welcome screen.
  • Fixed: An issue with the light theme display.
  • General bug fixes.
